nodes.text: The Iotran Guard was a unit of the Collections and Security Division of the InterGalactic Banking Clan led by Captain Tost and served as part of the Confederacy of Independent Systems' military forces during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. During the war, the Iotran Guard protected the Banking Clan's collection of vault worlds.

The Iotran Guard was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. It was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds, a 2004 sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game published by Wizards of the Coast.
